ðŸ“– Summary: Slonik is a Node.js PostgreSQL client emphasizing type safety, detailed logging, and composable SQL. It promotes writing raw SQL and discourages ad-hoc dynamic SQL generation. Key features include runtime validation, safe connection/transaction handling, detailed logging, and an ESLint plugin for SQL.
